item.title: Be Efficient With Chrome Bookmarks
item.description: How often do open Chrome and search for something to find an already known site. Usually you add a bookmark to frequently visited pages. But there is more to having bookmarks, and using bookmarks effectively. Here are some tips on how you can increase your productivity using your chrome bookmarks more effectively. 1. Categorise, prioritise and visualise bookmarks in Chrome Use folders to categorise your bookmarks in. For example, have your playing guitar links in one folder and your Recipies in another.
